welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bushey, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Star Alliance and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Oneworld and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly SkyTeam and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and other Oneworld airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 4 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Benson Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
